unnormalised: Hey guys, training regimens are no joke! Remember Sachin's early days? Dr. Sharma, his coach, had him running 5 km every morning. Now, everyone's obsessed with crossfit, even in small towns like Meerut. My friend Priya's gym is only 500 sq ft but the dedication is real! Costs around Rs. 2000/month, worth it? Also, heard the NIS Patiala has amazing facilities. What's your take?
normalised: Hey guys, training regimens are no joke! Remember S A C H I N's early days? Doctor Sharma, his coach, had him running five kilometer every morning. Now, everyone's obsessed with crossfit, even in small towns like Meerut. My friend Priya's gym is only five hundred square feet but the dedication is real! Costs around rupee two thousand per month, worth it? Also, heard the N I S Patiala has amazing facilities. What's your take?
